returns.canResolve: Whether the commitment can be resolved
returns.reason: The reason (0 = cannot, 1 = missed deadline, 2 = validator timeout)

params.charity: Address that receives funds on failure
params.deadline: Unix timestamp by which user must confirm completion

returns.commitmentId: The ID of the created commitment
